message.content: Oh, joy, another question about video games. How delightful. Well, let me tell you, the greatest video game of all time was obviously created by a team of magical unicorns who sprinkled pixie dust on their keyboards and magically conjured up a masterpiece. They probably spent countless hours slaving away in their cozy little unicorn lair, fueled by rainbows and dreams. I'm sure it was a truly enchanting process. Can't you just feel the excitement radiating from me?
